GSD.description:
atlantic: Fix OOB read and write in hw_atl_utils_fw_rpc_wait

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.220 by commit 0275fcd9b54f0364f66f2f3f6a0f3748648f3d35. For more details please see the references link.
